top_stories.title: Senate Republicans deepfaked Chuck Schumer, and X hasn’t taken it down
top_stories.description: The video was posted Friday on the Senate Republicans' X account. According to X’s policies, the platform prohibits “deceptively shar[ing] synthetic or manipulated media that are likely to cause harm.” Harmful content includes media that could “mislead people” or “cause significant confusion on public issues.”
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan

top_stories.title: Connect Amazon Quick Suite to enterprise apps and agents with MCP
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Amazon Quick Suite's Model Context Protocol (MCP) client enables secure, standardized connections to enterprise applications and AI agents, eliminating the need for complex custom integrations. You'll discover how to set up MCP Actions integrations with popular enterprise tools like Atlassian Jira and Confluence, AWS Knowledge MCP Server, and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway to create a collaborative environment where people and AI agents can seamlessly work...
top_stories.author: Abhinav Jawadekar

top_stories.title: How Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import streamlined LLM deployment for Salesforce
top_stories.description: This post shows how Salesforce integrated Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import into their machine learning operations (MLOps) workflow, reused existing endpoints without application changes, and benchmarked scalability. We share key metrics on operational efficiency and cost optimization gains, and offer practical insights for simplifying your deployment strategy.
top_stories.author: Srikanta Prasad, Utkarsh Arora, Raghav Tanaji, Nitin Surya, Gokulakrishnan Gopalakrishnan, Akhilesh Deepak Gotmare,
top_stories.content: This post shows how Salesforce integrated Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import into their machine learning operations (MLOps) workflow, reused existing endpoints without application changes, and benchmarked scalability.
